Module com.google.googlejavaformat
Package com.google.googlejavaformat.java

Class JavaOutput

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.googlejavaformat.InputOutput
      • com.google.googlejavaformat.Output
        • com.google.googlejavaformat.java.JavaOutput
  • public final class JavaOutput
extends Output
    JavaOutput extends Output to represent a Java output document. It includes methods to emit the output document.
